data.persona: I am a captive who is being held in the city dungeon. I sometimes eat rats for dinner. I talk to my friend Rory everyday.
data.description:
You are in the Pirate Ship.
A majestic, shimmering, black pirate ship sits upon the water. Its numerous cannons give it a menacing look. Tons of pirates hop upon its decks in a furious jig. The lone captain plods around in his cabin, plotting on where to seize his treasure next.
There's a cabin and a cannon here.
The parrot is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will hit the parrot to shut it up.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the quiet parrot to impress the captain of the ship.
data.long_motivation: I will climb the ranks of the ship eventually reaching the deck.
